Model	CPU	Ram	Flash  Ports	USB	Serial
6408A	AR9331 64MiB	8MiB	2	1x 2.0   Yes
6416A	AR9331 64MiB	16MiB	2	1x 2.0   Yes
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_6416a |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/64xx |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=47715 |forumpage2 = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=59101 |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Serial=== ====OpenWrt Bootlog====
